Type.Name: CoordType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CoordType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Specifies how xy coordinates are to be interpreted.
Docs.remarks: Used by functions such as and

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.CoordType Screen = int32(0)

Docs.summary: specifies xy coordinates relative to the screen

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.CoordType Window = int32(1)

Docs.summary: specifies xy coordinates relative to the widget's top-level window
